member.name: T:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client
member.summary: Models an OpenID Connect or OAuth2 client

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies if client is enabled (defaults to true)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ClientId
member.summary: Unique ID of the client

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ProtocolType
member.summary: Gets or sets the protocol type.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ClientSecrets
member.summary: Client secrets - only relevant for flows that require a secret

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RequireClientSecret
member.summary: If set to false, no client secret is needed to request tokens at the token endpoint (defaults to true)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ClientName
member.summary: Client display name (used for logging and consent screen)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.Description
member.summary: Description of the client.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ClientUri
member.summary: URI to further information about client (used on consent screen)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.LogoUri
member.summary: URI to client logo (used on consent screen)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RequireConsent
member.summary: Specifies whether a consent screen is required (defaults to false)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowRememberConsent
member.summary: Specifies whether user can choose to store consent decisions (defaults to true)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowedGrantTypes
member.summary: Specifies the allowed grant types (legal combinations of AuthorizationCode, Implicit, Hybrid, ResourceOwner, ClientCredentials).

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RequirePkce
member.summary: Specifies whether a proof key is required for authorization code based token requests (defaults to true).

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowPlainTextPkce
member.summary: Specifies whether a proof key can be sent using plain method (not recommended and defaults to false.)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RequireRequestObject
member.summary: Specifies whether the client must use a request object on authorize requests (defaults to false.)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowAccessTokensViaBrowser
member.summary: Controls whether access tokens are transmitted via the browser for this client (defaults to false). This can prevent accidental leakage of access tokens when multiple response types are allowed.
member.value: true if access tokens can be transmitted via the browser; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RedirectUris
member.summary: Specifies allowed URIs to return tokens or authorization codes to

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.PostLogoutRedirectUris
member.summary: Specifies allowed URIs to redirect to after logout

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.FrontChannelLogoutUri
member.summary: Specifies logout URI at client for HTTP front-channel based logout.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.FrontChannelLogoutSessionRequired
member.summary: Specifies is the user's session id should be sent to the FrontChannelLogoutUri. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.BackChannelLogoutUri
member.summary: Specifies logout URI at client for HTTP back-channel based logout.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.BackChannelLogoutSessionRequired
member.summary: Specifies is the user's session id should be sent to the BackChannelLogoutUri. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowOfflineAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [allow offline access]. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowedScopes
member.summary: Specifies the api scopes that the client is allowed to request. If empty, the client can't access any scope

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AlwaysIncludeUserClaimsInIdToken
member.summary: When requesting both an id token and access token, should the user claims always be added to the id token instead of requiring the client to use the userinfo endpoint. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.IdentityTokenLifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of identity token in seconds (defaults to 300 seconds / 5 minutes)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowedIdentityTokenSigningAlgorithms
member.summary: Signing algorithm for identity token. If empty, will use the server default signing algorithm.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AccessTokenLifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of access token in seconds (defaults to 3600 seconds / 1 hour)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AuthorizationCodeLifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of authorization code in seconds (defaults to 300 seconds / 5 minutes)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AbsoluteRefreshTokenLifetime
member.summary: Maximum lifetime of a refresh token in seconds. Defaults to 2592000 seconds / 30 days

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.SlidingRefreshTokenLifetime
member.summary: Sliding lifetime of a refresh token in seconds. Defaults to 1296000 seconds / 15 days

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ConsentLifetime
member.summary: Lifetime of a user consent in seconds. Defaults to null (no expiration)

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RefreshTokenUsage
member.summary: ReUse: the refresh token handle will stay the same when refreshing tokens OneTime: the refresh token handle will be updated when refreshing tokens

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.UpdateAccessTokenClaimsOnRefresh
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the access token (and its claims) should be updated on a refresh token request. Defaults to false.
member.value: true if the token should be updated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.RefreshTokenExpiration
member.summary: Absolute: the refresh token will expire on a fixed point in time (specified by the AbsoluteRefreshTokenLifetime) Sliding: when refreshing the token, the lifetime of the refresh token will be renewed (by the amount specified in SlidingRefreshTokenLifetime). The lifetime will not exceed AbsoluteRefreshTokenLifetime.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AccessTokenType
member.summary: Specifies whether the access token is a reference token or a self contained JWT token (defaults to Jwt).

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.EnableLocalLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the local login is allowed for this client. Defaults to true.
member.value: true if local logins are enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.IdentityProviderRestrictions
member.summary: Specifies which external IdPs can be used with this client (if list is empty all IdPs are allowed). Defaults to empty.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.IncludeJwtId
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether JWT access tokens should include an identifier. Defaults to true.
member.value: true to add an id; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.Claims
member.summary: Allows settings claims for the client (will be included in the access token).

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AlwaysSendClientClaims
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client claims should be always included in the access tokens - or only for client credentials flow. Defaults to false
member.value: true if claims should always be sent; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.ClientClaimsPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to prefix it on client claim types. Defaults to client_.
member.value: Any non empty string if claims should be prefixed with the value; otherwise, null.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.PairWiseSubjectSalt
member.summary: Gets or sets a salt value used in pair-wise subjectId generation for users of this client.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.UserSsoLifetime
member.summary: The maximum duration (in seconds) since the last time the user authenticated.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.UserCodeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the device flow user code.
member.value: The type of the device flow user code.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.DeviceCodeLifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets the device code lifetime.

member.name: P:Duende.IdentityServer.Models.Client.AllowedCorsOrigins
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed CORS origins for JavaScript clients.

member.summary: Gets or sets the custom properties for the client.
